articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: OnePlus' new Nord includes a 108-megapixel camera and 67W fast charging - The Verge
articles.description: The OnePlus Nord CE 3 Lite cots €329 (£299) and will go on sale on April 20th in select markets across Europe and Asia but not the US. It offers 67W fast charging and has a main camera with a resolution of 108 megapixels.
